product_description: Madewell's stretchiest skinny jeans have been transformed into comfy, slim-fitting denim cutoffs made with Magic Pockets in front to keep the look sleek.
product_details_and_care:
Madewell's stretchiest skinny jeans have been transformed into comfy, slim-fitting denim cutoffs made with Magic Pockets in front to keep the look sleek.
10 1/2" inseam; 14" leg opening; 11 1/2" front rise; 15" back rise (size Medium)
Zip fly with button closure
Five-pocket style
73% cotton, 16% polyester, 10% viscose, 1% elastane
Machine wash, tumble dry
Imported
t.b.d.
Item #6064782
